comment.author: 58934620@N02
comment._content: looks cute but I wager it was a bit spartan to live there...plumbing and heating and lighting would be rough.......BUT...I believe I could tough it out to go back in time...I pine for the simple life !.....I am lucky to live in a village ( by USA standards) by the sea....
